keyword: calories in grilled chicken wrap wendys
title: Calories in Wendy's Grilled Chicken Wrap
meta_description: Discover calories in grilled chicken wrap Wendys, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, sodium, and tweaks for custom orders.
h1: Calories in Wendy's Grilled Chicken Wrap
assumptions: Standard Wendy's Grilled Chicken Wrap: grilled chicken, lettuce, tomato, ranch sauce, flour tortilla; no customizations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, portion size, and customizations. Check Wendy's app or site for latest values.

quick_answer.text: Wendy's Grilled Chicken Wrap contains 270 kcal with 18 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with fast-food info.

faqs.q: How many calories in grilled chicken wrap Wendys?
What's the protein in Wendy's grilled chicken wrap?
faqs.a: About 18 g of protein per wrap.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a Wendy's grilled chicken wrap?
Are carbs high in grilled chicken wrap Wendys?
faqs.a: 32 g total carbs, including 2 g fiber, mostly from the tortilla.

faqs.q: Can I make Wendy's grilled chicken wrap lower calorie?
faqs.a: Yes, skip the ranch sauce to save ~30 kcal or request no cheese.
